sections.title: Intro
content: One bread, one body, one Lord of all,
One cup of blessing which we bless.
And we, though many throughout the earth,
We are one body in this one Lord.

sections.title: Verse 1
content: Gentile or Jew, servant or free,

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Many the gift, many the works,
One in the Lord of all.

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Grain for the fields, scattered and grown,
